short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the current page at its "first render" in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't blink, you might miss it! Content flashing caused by incomplete (or incompatible) isomorphic code can be tough to catch during development cycles. This extension aims to be an easy way to preview how your server-side rendering capable application (ie. Next.js) responds to an initial web request.
